ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] LEHP!
ygData.msgSnippet: you want Taunt Tani? Charm something off him, trust me it will forget he exists and rip into you real quick.  On a side note: camping king in solb. 2 king
ygData.messageBody:
you want Taunt Tani? Charm something off him, trust me it will forget he
exists and rip into you real quick. On a side note: camping king in solb.
2 king spawns: 2 HT takin by bard. *sigh*

How did the Raid go on veeshan's peak btw?

Minkin
42 bard
Sol Ro


Mac thats great news on the augmentation of our haste songs.. but i'll
beleive it when it goes live 8)


-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: November 6, 2000 2:51 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] LEHP!


Wow MacGrough, that sounds like it would be pretty cool! At least they're
working on it - although we've heard that before, haven't we....

Also, I need some advice! Unlike many bards who seem to die a lot, I'm
having the opposite problem, I'm killing party members :( Having some
trouble with Monk FD and cleric slaughter. Somehow I'm walking away
unscathed (still manage to kill myself fairly easily when soloing!).

I was told that bard song doesn't bother monk FD but it seems when my monk
friend FD, he dies reeeeally quickly. The cleric, seems I can't taunt off
of him... and does DA keep bard song from hitting him - specifically selos
:)

Thanks!

Tani "cleric killer" Kaat, 33rd Bardette
Halana, 57th Shaman, tasty snack for Hoshkar!
Paradigm
Solusek Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Donny Dane [mailto:ddane01@...]
> Sent: Monday, November 06, 2000 12:41 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Has anyone else used these recently
> and noticed?
>
>
> Ok, had a chance to quiz GZ on the songs this weekend at
> eqfest 2000 in
> Houston, TX.
>
> Pixe and such, are being/have been changed, during the
> patches that are
> going live...he wasn't specific on it.
>
> LULLABYE WILL BE CHANGED!
>
> GZ: "Look for some VERY interesting things to be happening to
> Lullaby soon"
> GZ: "We have been thinking about bard mez, we didn't want
> them to infringe
> on the Enchanter role, as that is what Enchanters do best,
> BUT we don't
> think that giving bards some mez abilities will hurt"
>
> These are not exact quotes, but pretty close.
>
> MacGrough Mich'Rathe
> Solusek Ro Wanderers
>
> p.s. One helluva weekend, even if it felt like being in the Karana's.
> EQFest 2000 was a blast!
> Check out eq.stratics.com and watch the official eq site for news!
> Thanks Ron!
> ----- Original Message -----
